paragraph: I am an experienced Software Engineer specializing in backend development with over four years of experience building scalable applications and RESTful APIs. My technical skills include Python, Django, and Node.js for backend development, complemented by front-end work with React and Next.js. I have hands-on experience in cloud services like AWS, deploying applications that are both reliable and high-performance. Passionate about delivering comprehensive web solutions, I strive to meet and exceed project goals with a continuous drive for improvement.
